    /**
     * List of @@modelName@@
     *
     * @Get("/")
     *
     * @Versions({"v1"})
     * @Parameters({
     *      @Parameter("page", description="The page of results to view.", type="integer", default=1)
     * })
     * @Response(200, body={
       "data": {{@@apiResponse@@}}
    })
     */
    public function index(@@requestClass@@ $request)
    {
       return $this->response->paginator(@@modelName@@::paginate(10), new @@transformer@@());
    }
